scripts.test: npm run yaspeller-ru && npm run yaspeller-uk
scripts.yaspeller-lang: r=0; if [[ "x${TRAVIS}" == "x" || "x${CHECK_FILES}" != "x" ]]; then $(npm bin)/yaspeller -l ${LANG} -e .${LANG}.md --dictionary .slang.${LANG}.json --report html ${CHECK_FILES:-.}; r=$?; else echo "There is nothing to check"; fi; mv -f yaspeller_report.html yaspeller_report.${LANG}.html; exit ${r}
